name: Die On Me
description:
A party of brave heroes is about to defeat the evil overlord, but things arenít going as intended: the overlord is so strong that he manages to kill them all.

The mage of the group uses his last breath to cast a spell on the overlord, thus allowing him to take control of the lord of darknessís body.

You can now control the evil overlord and it's up to you to find a way to make him die, but donít think that it will be a piece of cake: the overlord is very tough and youíll have to face traps, mysterious mechanisms and a lot of platforms in order to reach your objective.
